description: in here all accounts are saved
name: account

not_null_keys.description: hash of the password of the account
not_null_keys.name: password_hash

not_null_keys.description: salt for hashing the password of the account
not_null_keys.name: password_salt

not_null_keys.description: indicates if account has elevated admin rights
not_null_keys.name: is_admin

not_null_keys.description: indicates if account should be hidden on public page
not_null_keys.name: is_private

not_null_keys.description: indicates if account is banned in writing comments
not_null_keys.name: is_banned_comments

not_null_keys.description: indicates if account is banned in creating new (playlist) entries
not_null_keys.name: is_banned_entries

null_keys.description: real name of account
null_keys.name: name

null_keys.name: server_file_path_profile_picture

null_keys.description: server file path to background picture of account
null_keys.name: server_file_path_bg_picture

null_keys.description: account status text
null_keys.name: status

description: in here all artist are saved
name: artist

null_keys.description: more information about the artist
null_keys.name: description

null_keys.description: link to the YouTube account of the artist

name: song_content_type

null_keys.name: description

not_null_keys.description: date when song language was added
not_null_keys.name: date

not_null_keys.description: account that added the song language
